QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, encid, case when biomarker_source != '' or biomarker_source is not null then concat(concat(biomarker,'|'), biomarker_source) else biomarker end as source_value, encounterdate, numeric_result, variant, 32858 type_concept_id, 0 source_concept_id, case when biomarker='amyloid beta 40 peptide' and biomarker_source='plasma' then 42868556 when biomarker='amyloid beta 40 peptide' and biomarker_source='cerebrospinal fluid' then 42868555 when biomarker='amyloid beta 40 peptide' then 42868556 when biomarker='amyloid beta 42 peptide/amyloid beta 40 peptide' and biomarker_source='blood' then 0 --Mapping available in August 2025 release of vocabulary loinc code =106941-8 when biomarker='amyloid beta 42 peptide/amyloid beta 40 peptide' and biomarker_source='cerebrospinal fluid' then 1617024 when biomarker='amyloid beta 42 peptide/amyloid beta 40 peptide' and biomarker_source='plasma' then 0 --Mapping available in August 2025 release of vocabulary loinc code =106941-8 when biomarker='amyloid beta 42 peptide/amyloid beta 40 peptide' then 0 --Mapping available in August 2025 release of vocabulary loinc code =106941-8 when biomarker='amyloid beta-peptides' and biomarker_source='blood' then 1091801 when biomarker='amyloid beta-peptides' and biomarker_source='cerebrospinal fluid' then 1091801 when biomarker='amyloid beta-peptides' and biomarker_source='plasma' then 1091801 when biomarker='amyloid beta-peptides' then 1091801 when biomarker='amyloid beta-protein (1-42)' and biomarker_source='blood' then 3043102 when biomarker='amyloid beta-protein (1-42)' and biomarker_source='cerebrospinal fluid' then 3042810 when biomarker='amyloid beta-protein (1-42)' and biomarker_source='plasma' then 3043102 when biomarker='amyloid beta-protein (1-42)' then 3043102 when biomarker='amyloid tau index' and biomarker_source='cerebrospinal fluid' then 3042151 when biomarker='amyloid tau index' then 3042151 when biomarker='apolipoprotein e' and biomarker_source='blood' then 3044063 when biomarker='apolipoprotein e' and biomarker_source='cerebrospinal fluid' then 1617460 when biomarker='apolipoprotein e' and biomarker_source='plasma' then 3044063 when biomarker='apolipoprotein e' then 3044063 when biomarker='phosphorylated tau protein' and biomarker_source='blood' then 3011901 when biomarker='phosphorylated tau protein' and biomarker_source='cerebrospinal fluid' then 3000242 when biomarker='phosphorylated tau protein' and biomarker_source='plasma' then 3011901 when biomarker='phosphorylated tau protein' then 3011901 when biomarker='tau protein, phosphorylated 181' and biomarker_source='cerebrospinal fluid' then 43055225 when biomarker='tau protein, phosphorylated 181' then 1259491 when biomarker='tau protein, phosphorylated 217' then 1092155 when biomarker='tau protein/amyloid beta 42 peptide' and biomarker_source='cerebrospinal fluid' then 3042151 when biomarker='tau proteins' and biomarker_source='blood' then 3011901 when biomarker='tau proteins' and biomarker_source='cerebrospinal fluid' then 3000242 when biomarker='tau proteins' then 3011901 when biomarker='total tau protein' and biomarker_source='blood' then 3011901 when biomarker='total tau protein' and biomarker_source='cerebrospinal fluid' then 3000242 when biomarker='total tau protein' and biomarker_source='plasma' then 3011901 when biomarker='total tau protein' then 3011901 end as concept_id FROM {sc}.alz_biomarker l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by 1
